title: MailChimp Automation / Workflow
snippet:
I need set up groups within my primary list to deliver specific promotions and messages based on selections.

E.g. One central form has 4 options. Aside from collecting name and email, the user can only select 1 of the 4 options - mens, women's, boys, girls. If the user opts in for a mens promotion they receive an automated email with the information for that promotion.

I need to be able to send to these groups individually in the future for targeted messaging as well as blanket messaging

Tasks:
-Set up 1 automated workflow for this for each option.
-Create the form
-Send the embed code

This job could potentially land you longer term management for email marketing management/strategy.
